Primary Contact: Christina MacMaster, Community Programs & Services Coordinator; Email: wellnesscentre@shaw.ca
Service Details: - Offers solace and support to anyone who has suffered the loss of a loved one in a setting of comfort and trust- Connected by something that transcends their differences, all participants have all suffered the loss of a loved one, and are struggling to cope- Experienced volunteer facilitators provide a confidential setting in which participants take part at whatever level is appropriate for them, find compassionate understanding, active listening from others, and learn to work through the process of grieving
Meetings: Bereavement Group:  every Thu starting at 10:00am, throughout the year at the Tranquil Room, Peachland Wellness Centre- Everyone is welcome- Coffee and goodies are served- Please contact the Centre or feel free to drop in during the session
